description: The awslambda package helps you invoke AWS lambda functions
The awssqs package helps you manage messaging and queueing services
The awssns package helps you implement messaging services for system-to-system and app-to-person (A2P) communication.
The azureservicebus package lets you integrate messaging services using Microsoft's services.
The awsdynamodb package helps you create and manage DynamoDB services on AWS
The ftp package helps you upload and download files to and from an FTP server, and other FTP operations
The awss3legacy package helps store, retrieve, or upload data on SWS S3. This package is a part of cffile and cfdirectory implementations
The websocket package allows you create WebSocket objects and broadcast messages
The com package helps you creates and manipulate a Component Object Model (COM) object using CFML
The pdf package lets you read an existing PDF, write meta-data to it, merge PDFs together, delete pages, create thumbnails of the pages, and much more
The print package helps you print specified pages from a PDF file and perform automated batch print jobs
The report package lets you create a report and  displaying it in a PDF, RTF, HTML, XML or Excel format
The exchange package helps you retrieve mail messages and attachments, deletes messages, and more on a Microsoft Exchange server
The feed package helps you read or create an RSS or Atom syndication feed
The derby package helps you create an Apache Derby datasource
The oracle package helps you create an Oracle datasource
The mysql package helps you create an MySQL datasource
The sqlserver package helps you create an SQL server datasource
The db2 package helps you create an DB2 datasource
The sybase package helps you create an Sybase datasource
The postgresql package helps you create an Postgresql datasource
The odbc package helps you connect to various database services
The htmltopdf package helps you create PDF output from a text block containing CFML and HTML using the PDF Service Manager
The search package helps you search one or more Solr collections
The orm package allows you to work with objects and have them saved to the database automatically
The ormsearch package helps you search for text in specific properties or entities, or based on a Lucene query
The eventgateways package lets ColdFusion react to or generated external events or messages in an asynchronous manner
The cfmongodb package helps you create apps on a document-based, distributed NoSQL database
The sharepoint package helps you create lists, retrieve list items, and update list items on a SharePoint server
The awss3 package helps you store, retrieve, or upload data on AWS S3. This package is a part of cloud implementation services
The document package helps you creates PDF output from a text block containing CFML and HTML
The azureblob package lets you store large amounts of unstructured data on Microsoft's data storage platform
The scheduler package allows you to run a CFML page at scheduled intervals, with the option to write the page output to a static HTML page
The saml package lets you configure ColdFusion applications with SAML authentication
The debugger package helps you debug CFML applications. You can set breakpoints, step over, into, or out of code, and inspect variables
The pmtagent package helps you configure ColdFusion with Performance Monitoring Toolset
The dotnet package lets you access and use Microsoft .NET assembly classes as CFML objects
The mail package helps you send emails or use a query to send a mail message to a database-driven list of recipients
The zip package helps you execute tasks like zip and unzip, and also list contents in an archive
The image package lets you perform various image processing functions
The redissessionstorage package lets you store sessions in external cache servers like Redis, instead of in-memory storage in ColdFusion servers
The chart package helps you create plots and graphs using CFML.
The spreadsheet package lets you execute spreadsheet functions on an XLSX or CSV file
The ajax package helps you develop effective Ajax applications that use ColdFusion to provide dynamic data
The caching package lets you improve your application's performance using the various caching engines, like, EHCache, JCS, Redis, and Memcached
comment: ehcache core and web being used across the code. So not removing from LIB. Using it and setting them in felix's system package. Later we can remove once dependent code is also converted to bundles

description: The axis package helps you to create web services using SOAP and WSDL specifications
The presentation package helps you define the look of a dynamic slide presentation
The adminapi package modifies the administrator-level settings
The administrator package manages and changes the settings of ColdFusion server
